summary: A small mod I made for a friend. Adds a new hireling to the Bee and Barb named Jakob Wiggins.
descriptionHtml:
A small mod I made for a friend. Adds a new hireling to the Bee and Barb named Jakob Wiggins. 


Meet Jakob, a swashbuckling adventurer and mercenary. He will lend you a hand... for a price! 

Uses Dawnbreaker and Spellbreaker as well as a Glass Bow 

He knows the Fire Breath, Frost Breath and Unrelenting Force shouts 

He will level with your character 

He is set as essential


Every detail of this mod was on request by my good friend Scout. He designed this mod really, I only created it. Because of this no changes will be made to this mod in the future apart from any possible bug fixes that may arise. 


Jakob may be experiencing possible greyface issues [unconfirmed]. if you use this mod could you please let me know if this is happening. 

Enjoy!
author: TheGreyLight
